item.title: SSMB 29: Rajamouli-Mahesh Babu film launch date locked? - 123telugu
item.description:
SSMB 29: Rajamouli-Mahesh Babu Film Launch Date Locked?

Published on: Jan 1, 2025 11:50 am IST

Global sensations SS Rajamouli and Superstar Mahesh Babu are set for a collaboration in the film tentatively titled SSMB 29. Exciting news for fans has emerged regarding its impending launch.

  • The movie's official launch is scheduled for January 2, 2025, at Aluminium Factory in Hyderabad.
  • The event is expected to start after 10 AM, with key team members in attendance.
  • Produced by KL Narayana under Durga Arts, the film has a script by Vijayendra Prasad and music composed by Oscar-winner MM Keeravaani.
  • Rumors suggest Priyanka Chopra may be the female lead and Prithviraj Sukumaran as the antagonist, although these details are yet to be confirmed.
“Stay tuned for more updates as this epic project unfolds.”

This collaboration between Rajamouli and Mahesh Babu promises to be an exciting addition to Telugu cinema, with high expectations from fans for its global appeal.

item.title: Pic Talk: Akhil and Zainab Ravdjee’s elegant mirror selfie wins hearts - 123telugu
item.description:
Akhil and Zainab Ravdjee’s Elegant Mirror Selfie Wins Hearts

Published on: Jan 1, 2025 10:11 am IST

Akhil Akkineni, a popular Telugu actor, has recently shared a charming mirror selfie with his fiancée, Zainab Ravdjee. The couple's graceful appearance has garnered admiration from fans.

  • Akhil's upcoming film is tentatively titled 'Lenin' and directed by Murali Kishore Abburu.
  • Sreeleela will star as the female lead in the film.
  • The mirror selfie, taken by Zainab, displays their elegant look, winning over their fans.
  • Details about their wedding and Akhil's next film project remain undisclosed.
  • The film is being produced by Annapurna Studios and Sithara Entertainments, with music by Thaman.
“The couple’s elegant appearance in the picture has drawn admiration, with fans calling them a stunning pair.”

Fans are eagerly awaiting further updates on Akhil's personal and professional journey.

item.title: Hidden Love Fame Zhao Lusi's SHOCKING Health Condition Of 'Depression, Abuse' Leaves Fans Furious With Her Com - Times Now
item.description:
Zhao Lusi's Health Crisis Sparks Outrage Among Fans

Publication Date: January 1, 2023 | Source: TNN

The health condition of Hidden Love actor Zhao Lusi has raised significant concerns among fans and the entertainment community, following reports of her hospitalization due to severe health issues attributed to emotional and physical stress in the industry.

  • Zhao Lusi collapsed on set and was hospitalized, sparking discussions about celebrity pressure and mental health.
  • Her agency confirmed she will suspend work commitments due to her health crisis.
  • Reports indicated she suffered from abuse and harassment related to her performance and appearance.
  • Fans have expressed their outrage on social media, demanding accountability from her management.
“There were five other people present at the scene…does that mean you can treat her this way?!”

The situation has captured widespread attention, highlighting the need for better mental health support within the entertainment industry as fans rally for Lusi's well-being.

item.title: Who Is Sivasri Skandaprasad? All About The Carnatic Singer Set To Marry BJP MP Tejasvi Surya - Free Press Journal
item.description:
Who Is Sivasri Skandaprasad? All About The Carnatic Singer Set To Marry BJP MP Tejasvi Surya

Date & Source: Published on: January 01, 2025, Source: unknown

Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) MP Tejasvi Surya is reportedly set to marry renowned Carnatic singer Sivasri Skandaprasad in Bengaluru. Although there hasn't been an official announcement, the wedding is anticipated to take place on March 4, 2025.

Key Points:

  • Sivasri Skandaprasad is a renowned Carnatic singer and holds degrees in Bioengineering, Bharatanatyam, and Sanskrit.
  • She gained fame after PM Modi praised her 2014 devotional song on YouTube.
  • Sivasri has ventured into playback singing, contributing to films like 'Ponniyin Selvan: Part 1.'
  • Tejasvi Surya is a lawyer and currently serves as an MP for Bengaluru South.
  • Both share a passion for sports and physical endurance activities.
"This rendition by Sivasri Skandaprasad in Kannada beautifully highlights the spirit of devotion to Prabhu Shri Ram. Such efforts go a long way in preserving our rich cultural heritage," - PM Modi

In conclusion, the upcoming union between Sivasri Skandaprasad and Tejasvi Surya is generating interest, promising to meld cultural heritage with public service in a high-profile marriage.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor runs to give Alia Bhatt a hug, snuggles with Raha as they welcome New Year with Neetu Kapoor, Soni Razdan - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor runs to give Alia Bhatt a hug, snuggles with Raha as they welcome New Year with Neetu Kapoor, Soni Razdan

Date: Jan 01, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Kapoor and Razdan families rang in the New Year together in a celebratory event on a huge lawn with fireworks.

  • Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor celebrated the New Year with their daughter, Raha Kapoor.
  • The families included Soni Razdan, Neetu Kapoor, and Riddhima Kapoor Sahni, among others.
  • Neetu shared joyful moments on Instagram, including a clip of Ranbir hugging Alia.
  • The celebration featured a picturesque outdoor setup next to a swimming pool.
  • Fans can look forward to Alia's film Alpha and Ranbir's upcoming projects like Animal Park.
“The party’s just begun, and 2025 is ready to shine! #NewYearVibes. Happy New Year, Instagram Fam.” - Riddhima Kapoor Sahni

The warm family gathering highlights the joy of togetherness as they welcomed the New Year with love and laughter.

item.title: Latest: Date and time locked for Game Changer trailer - 123telugu
item.description:
Latest: Date and time locked for Game Changer trailer

Published on: Jan 1, 2025, 9:27 am IST

Global star Ram Charan is set to thrill audiences with his new film Game Changer, a political drama directed by Shankar Shanmugam, releasing on January 10, 2025.

  • The trailer will be unveiled on January 2, 2025, at 5:04 PM.

  • Produced by Dil Raju under Sri Venkateswara Creations, featuring a compelling soundtrack by Thaman S.

item.title: Chinese Zodiac says 2025 is ‘Year of the Snake’; find out what that means for your zodiac sign - The Indian Express
item.description:
Chinese Zodiac says 2025 is ‘Year of the Snake’; find out what that means for your zodiac sign

Date: Not specified   Source: Indian Express

The upcoming New Year 2025 is designated as the Year of the Snake according to the Chinese Zodiac, which is viewed as a highly auspicious time. Experts highlight that this year will bring about transformation, wisdom, and positive changes, urging all zodiac signs to introspect and redefine their paths in life.

  • The Year of the Snake symbolizes wisdom, transformation, and growth.
  • Astrologer Kishori Sud emphasizes opportunities for personal development and introspection for all signs.
  • Each zodiac sign has specific themes and guidance for the year, focusing on their strengths and overcoming negative aspects.
  • The year encourages emotional healing, balance in relationships, and pursuing one's true purpose.
“2025 is supposed to be a good year for most. Those who may experience ups and downs must understand that these are opportunities for you to grow as a person.” - Kishori Sud

As we enter the Year of the Snake, it is a time for positive change, introspection, and transformative growth for every zodiac sign.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap opens up about why Kennedy wasn’t released, says he has lost the energy to fight: ‘Five of my films are lying unreleased’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Anurag Kashyap opens up about why Kennedy wasn’t released, says he has lost the energy to fight: ‘Five of my films are lying unreleased’

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Anurag Kashyap reveals the ongoing challenges with the release of his film Kennedy, expressing disappointment and frustration with the current film industry's focus on profit over creativity.

  • Kashyap's film Kennedy premiered at the 2023 Cannes Film Festival but remains unreleased.
  • He has five projects currently in limbo and has distanced himself from Kennedy.
  • He criticizes the film industry for being more concerned about profits than filmmaking quality.
  • Kashyap feels disillusioned with the industry and contemplates moving out of Mumbai.
“I have made five films that are lying unreleased. Where is Kennedy? And whose hands is Kennedy in?” — Anurag Kashyap

Kashyap's revelations highlight a troubling trend in the film industry prioritizing financial success over artistic integrity, leaving many talented filmmakers feeling defeated.

item.title: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt divorce settlement: ‘Malaficient’ star hopes her ex-husband will now ‘stop a - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt divorce settlement: ‘Malaficient’ star hopes her ex-husband will now ‘stop attacking her’

Publication Date: Not availableSource: Not available

Angelina Jolie expresses hope that her ex-husband Brad Pitt will cease his ongoing disputes against her amidst their divorce settlement.

  • Jolie wishes for an end to the conflict surrounding their past relationship.
  • Reports indicate ongoing legal battles over custody and property.
  • The couple has been in a lengthy divorce process since 2016.
“I hope he will stop attacking me,” said Jolie.

This article highlights the significant emotional and legal struggles faced by both parties as they navigate their divorce.

item.title: Numerology Horoscope Today: Predictions for January 1, 2025 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Numerology Horoscope Today: Predictions for January 1, 2025

Publication Date: January 1, 2025
Source: Astro Zindagi

This article provides numerology predictions for individuals based on their birth dates for January 1, 2025, highlighting opportunities and energies that will influence their day.

  • Number 1: Positive energy in career; expect increased productivity and clarity.
  • Number 2: A stable day, making wise financial decisions.
  • Number 3: Favorable day for work; confidence will aid in success.
  • Number 4: Beginning of significant ventures; confidence in future outcomes.
  • Number 5: Great instincts for seizing opportunities; adaptability is key.
  • Number 6: Steady focus on financial stability; small successes will build momentum.
  • Number 7: Warm relationships are fostered through sensitivity to others.
  • Number 8: A chance to showcase skills; recognition is readily attainable.
  • Number 9: Discipline and reliability will enhance reputation and relationships.
“Let your quiet confidence prevail, and savour the fruits of harmonious interaction with people.”

The predictions indicate that January 1, 2025, will offer unique opportunities based on one's numerology, enhancing personal and professional growth.

item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's Hindi Version Surpasses ₹1000 Crore Worldwide

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's film Pushpa 2 has created history by grossing over ₹1000 crore worldwide with its Hindi version.

  • The film has achieved a significant milestone in box office collection.
  • This marks a notable success for the Hindi-dubbed version of South Indian cinema.
  • The popularity of the lead actors has contributed to the film's success.
“Pushpa 2 breaks barriers and sets new records in the Indian film industry.”

This remarkable achievement highlights the growing influence and reach of regional films in the broader Indian market.

item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 1, 2025 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for January 1, 2025

Publication Date: January 1, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

This horoscope provides guidance for all zodiac signs regarding love and relationships on January 1, 2025. Each sign receives personalized advice aimed at navigating emotional challenges and embracing opportunities in love.

  • Aries: Reflect on love expectations; sometimes connections break to pave the way for better matches.
  • Taurus: Allow yourself to express emotions freely; releasing frustration leads to liberation.
  • Gemini: Take a pause to understand your heart's desires before rushing into love.
  • Cancer: Don't self-blame for relationship tension; external factors may be at play.
  • Leo: Small gestures in love carry significant meaning; show your support for your partner.
  • Virgo: Healing begins; trust is slow to restore but positive changes are happening.
  • Libra: Focus on acceptance in relationships; clarity comes from self-reflection.
  • Scorpio: Recognize your self-worth in love; standing your ground is important.
  • Sagittarius: Use this waiting period to grow into the person meant for true connection.
  • Capricorn: Take initiative in love; be proactive in communication.
  • Aquarius: Stay strong in spirit despite challenges; don’t let negativity control you.
  • Pisces: Embrace inactivity as a preparation phase for upcoming love.
- Neeraj Dhankher, Vedic Astrologer, Founder - Astro Zindagi

item.title: Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here’s what we know! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sujoy Ghosh to team up with Shahid Kapoor post exit from Shah Rukh Khan starrer King? Here’s what we know!

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Bollywood actor Shahid Kapoor and acclaimed director Sujoy Ghosh are reportedly aligning their schedules to collaborate on a new thriller project, although no official confirmation has been made yet.

  • Shahid and Sujoy are prioritizing their schedules to bring the project to fruition.
  • A source indicated that Shahid had previously shown interest in the script, but timing was not right.
  • The project promises a suspenseful narrative, reflecting Sujoy Ghosh's filmmaking style.
  • Shahid Kapoor's recent works include the digital series Farzi and the film Bloody Daddy.
  • His upcoming film, Deva, is set for release on January 31, 2025.
“Shahid was interested in the script earlier, but the timing wasn’t right. Now, both Sujoy and he are making it a priority to align their schedules and bring it to life.”

The speculation continues as Shahid's team has denied any ongoing discussions for a new film with Sujoy Ghosh, creating anticipation among fans for what might come next.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 7 (Early Trends): Only 16% Jump – Will New Year Bring New Hopes For Varun Dhawan? - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 7 (Early Trends)

Publication Date: December 31, 2024 Source: Koimoi

Despite high hopes, Varun Dhawan's film Baby John has struggled at the box office, earning just 32.65 crore in its first week, making it his lowest-earning film to date. On its seventh day, it saw only a 16% increase in earnings compared to the previous day.

  • The film has a total of 32.65 crore after 7 days.
  • On Day 7, it earned 2.15 crore, a slight increase from the previous day’s 1.85 crore.
  • Baby John needs to exceed the lifetime earnings of October to avoid being recorded as Varun Dhawan's lowest performer.
  • It is projected to face tough competition from Mufasa: The Lion King.
  • With a production budget of 160 crore, it has only recovered 20% of its costs.
"Baby John has not showed any visible jump on the last day of the year. Hopefully the new year brings a new hope for the film to redeem at the box office, but the chances seem very meek."

The film’s dismal performance raises concerns for its future, as it concludes a tumultuous week at the box office.

item.title: Pisces Monthly Horoscope for January 2025 predicts unforeseen circumstances - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Monthly Horoscope for January 2025 predicts unforeseen circumstances

Date: January 01, 2025 & Source: Hindustan Times

This month, Pisces focus on personal growth, love, career, and health while emphasizing careful financial planning to avoid unforeseen circumstances.

  • Financial planning is crucial this January.

  • Romance may see intriguing connections for singles and strengthened bonds for those in relationships.
  • Career opportunities demand strategic thinking and creativity.
  • Monitor spending habits and explore stable investment opportunities.
  • Health remains steady with emphasis on physical activity and mental relaxation.
“Stay calm and consistent in your efforts, and the year will reward you in ways you might not have imagined.”

The horoscope calls for Pisces to enhance personal and professional life while being mindful of finances and health.

item.description:
Virgo Monthly Horoscope for January 2025

This month, January brings opportunities and growth for Virgos, with focuses on personal development, career advancements, and maintaining balanced relationships.

item.title: Taurus Monthly Horoscope for January, 2025 predicts significant growth - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Taurus Monthly Horoscope for January, 2025

Date: Jan 01, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

January offers growth in career and personal connections. Focus on nurturing bonds and embracing new challenges to achieve success and happiness.

  • Taurus individuals will experience significant professional and personal growth.

This month brings valuable opportunities for Taurus individuals to grow in various aspects of life, emphasizing the importance of focus, relationship building, and health management for a fulfilling month ahead.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 27 (Early Trends): Allu Arjun Brings Top 10 Highest Grossing Last Day Of The Year, Pushes Bajirao Mastani Out! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 27: Allu Arjun Sets New Record

Publication Date: January 1, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun delivered a successful last day of the year at the box office, bringing a record total for Pushpa 2 Hindi as the year concludes. The film stands at an estimated total of 782 crore after 27 days and is expected to cross the 800 crore mark soon.

Key Points:

  • On December 31, Pushpa 2 earned approximately 6.25 – 6.5 crore, a 13% increase from the previous day.
  • It achieves the 10th biggest last day of the year box office collection for Hindi films, surpassing Bajirao Mastani.
  • The total estimated collection is 782 crore against a budget of 200 crore, resulting in a 291% profit margin.

Notable Quotes:

"Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 has not only dominated the box office but also set a new benchmark for last day collections within the Hindi film industry.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan's son Aryan goes out and about in city with rumoured GF Larissa Bonesi as they ring New Year 2025 together - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Aryan Khan and Larissa Bonesi Celebrate New Year's 2025 Together

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Shah Rukh Khan's eldest son, Aryan Khan, was spotted with his rumored girlfriend Larissa Bonesi as they welcomed the new year 2025 in style.

  • Aryan Khan arrived at a party with Larissa Bonesi, where they turned heads with their fashionable appearances.
  • Aryan opted for a casual look with black pants, a white t-shirt, and a navy jacket, paired with silver sneakers.
  • Larissa wore a shimmery pink dress with a white jacket and silver heels, showcasing her glamorous style.
  • The couple was surrounded by paparazzi but avoided posing, opting instead to head directly into the party.
  • Other celebrities present included MC Stan and Ada Malik.
  • Aryan Khan is preparing to make his directorial debut with a multi-genre series under Shah Rukh Khan's Red Chillies Entertainment, set to release on Netflix in 2025.
“It is expected to be a multi-genre exploration of Bollywood’s world, promising to bring untamed storytelling to life.”

This outing marks a stylish start to 2025 for Aryan and Larissa, drawing attention from fans and paparazzi alike.

item.title: Makers of Shahid Kapoors Deva to unveil first poster on January 1, 2025 - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Makers of Shahid Kapoor’s Deva to unveil first poster on January 1, 2025

Publication Date: January 1, 2025 Source: Bollywood Hungama

As the excitement for Zee Studios and Roy Kapur Films' Deva builds, the first poster is set to be revealed on January 1, 2025, promising to captivate audiences with its fiery visuals and Shahid Kapoor's compelling look.

  • The first poster will be unveiled on January 1, 2025.
  • The film is directed by Rosshan Andrrews and set for release on January 31, 2025.
  • Includes a special connection to Amitabh Bachchan that fans will appreciate.
  • Shahid Kapoor describes his character as “Dark, menacing, and vulnerable”.
“Roy Kapur Films and Zee Studios are set to kickstart the New Year with a bang, unveiling the first poster of Deva, starring Shahid Kapoor.”

This upcoming action-packed thriller is highly anticipated, with expectations of a thrilling cinematic experience for fans.

item.title: Raha hugs Ranbir Kapoor tightly in photos from their New Year celebration with Alia Bhatt, Neetu Kapoor, - TOI Etimes

Raha hugs Ranbir Kapoor tightly in photos from their New Year celebration with Alia Bhatt, Neetu Kapoor, Riddhima Kapoor and Samara Sahni

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Kangana Ranaut calls out Avinash Mishra for his ‘overacting; says, “Natural raho, ussi ke p - The Times of India
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut Critiques Avinash Mishra's Acting on Bigg Boss 18

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured actress Kangana Ranaut, who humorously advised contestant Avinash Mishra to tone down his dramatic acting style.

  • Kangana made a special appearance, offering advice and engaging with contestants.
  • She advised Avinash, saying, “Overacting nahi karna hai, natural, ussi ke paise milte hai” (Don’t overact, be natural; that’s what gets you paid).
  • The episode included a task where contestants had to give doses and treatments.
  • Kangana's entry generated excitement and brought a lighter mood to the show.
  • Avinash remains popular among fans for his entertaining antics, which sometimes spark debate.
Kangana's feedback highlighted the balance between entertainment and natural performance expected from contestants.

As Bigg Boss 18 unfolds, the interactions with prominent guests like Kangana continue to enhance the show's entertainment value.
